data.name: AccountDuplicateEmail
data.value: A username for that e-mail address already exists. Please enter a different e-mail address.
data.comment: Error message shown with account management

data.name: AccountDuplicateUserName
data.value: Username already exists. Please enter a different user name.
data.comment: Error message shown with account management

data.name: AccountInformation
data.comment: Shown on the My Account page

data.name: AccountInformationEmail
data.comment: Used on the change account information form

data.name: AccountInformationLink
data.comment: Link shown on the My Account page to open the change account information form

data.name: AccountInformationTitle
data.comment: Title of the change account information form

data.name: AccountInvalidAnswer
data.value: The password retrieval answer provided is invalid. Please check the value and try again.
data.comment: Error message shown with account management

data.name: AccountInvalidEmail
data.value: The e-mail address provided is invalid. Please check the value and try again.
data.comment: Error message shown with account management

data.name: AccountInvalidPassword
data.value: The password provided is invalid. Please enter a valid password value.
data.comment: Error message shown with account management

data.name: AccountInvalidQuestion
data.value: The password retrieval question provided is invalid. Please check the value and try again.
data.comment: Error message shown with account management

data.name: AccountInvalidUserName
data.value: The user name provided is invalid. Please check the value and try again.
data.comment: Error message shown with account management

data.name: AccountProviderError
data.value: The authentication provider returned an error. Please verify your entry and try again. If the problem persists, please contact your system administrator.
data.comment: Error message shown with account management

data.name: AccountUnknownError
data.value: An unknown error occurred. Please verify your entry and try again. If the problem persists, please contact your system administrator.
data.comment: Error message shown with account management

data.name: AccountUserRejected
data.value: The user creation request has been canceled. Please verify your entry and try again. If the problem persists, please contact your system administrator.
data.comment: Error message shown with account management

data.name: Albums
data.comment: Albums

data.name: Cancel
data.comment: Shown on some forms

data.name: ChangeAccountInformationErrors
data.value: Account information change was unsuccessful. Please correct the errors and try again.
data.comment: Shown on the change account information form when errors occurred

data.name: ChangeAccountInformationSuccess
data.comment: Message shown on a successful Account Information update

data.name: ChangeAccountNoInfo
data.value: You have not requested any changes to your account. Please check your entry and try again.
data.comment: Shown on the Change Account Information form if nothing is entered

data.name: ChangeEmailHint
data.value: Leave blank unless you want to change your email address
data.comment: Shown on the Change Account Information form

data.name: ChangePasswordConfirmPassword
data.comment: Used on change password form

data.name: ChangePasswordCurrentMissing
data.value: You must specify your current password.
data.comment: Error message shown when current password is missing

data.name: ChangePasswordCurrentPassword
data.comment: Used on change password form

data.name: ChangePasswordErrors
data.value: Password change was unsuccessful. Please correct the errors and try again.
data.comment: Shown on the change password form when errors occurred

data.name: ChangePasswordFailed
data.value: The current username or password provided is incorrect or the new password is invalid.
data.comment: Error message shown when trying to change password fails

data.name: ChangePasswordHint
data.value: Leave blank unless you want to change your password
data.comment: Shown on the change account information form

data.name: ChangePasswordMinLength
data.value: You must specify a new password of {0} or more characters.
data.comment: Error message shown when new password is too short

data.name: ChangePasswordNewPassword
data.comment: Used on change password form

data.name: ChangePasswordNoEmail
data.value: You must specify an email address.
data.comment: Error message shown when no email entered

data.name: ChangePasswordNoMatch
data.value: The new password and confirmation password do not match.
data.comment: Error message shown when changing passwords don't match

data.name: ChangePasswordNoPassword
data.comment: Error message shown when no password entered

data.name: ChangePasswordNoUsername
data.comment: Error message shown when no username entered

data.name: ChangeTheme
data.comment: Displayed as the change theme title

data.name: ConfirmPassword
data.comment: Displayed on the register form

data.name: Email
data.comment: Displayed on the register form

data.name: FavouritesFailedAdd
data.value: An error occurred saving the track.
data.comment: Message returned from a failed add to favourites due to an unknown reason

data.name: FavouritesFailedNothingAdd
data.value: Failed to add this track to your favourites. It's already a favourite of yours!
data.comment: Message returned from a failed add to favourites due to the track already being a favourite

data.name: FavouritesFailedRemove
data.value: An error occurred when trying to remove the track.
data.comment: Message returned from a failed remove from favourites due to an unknown reason

data.name: FavouritesFailedRemoveNotFound
data.comment: Message returned from a failed remove from favourites due to the track not being found

data.name: FavouritesSuccessAdd
data.value: You've successfully added this track to your favourites!
data.comment: Message returned from a successful add to favourites

data.name: FavouritesSuccessRemove
data.value: Your've successfully removed this track from your favourites!
data.comment: Message returned from a successful remove from favourites

data.name: FormFieldsRequired
data.comment: Shown on various forms to show which fields are required

data.name: Home
data.comment: Displayed on the Home tab

data.name: Loading
data.comment: Loading...

data.name: Login
data.comment: Displayed on the login form

data.name: Logout
data.comment: Shown on the My Account page

data.name: ManageFavourites
data.comment: Displayed on the Manage Favourites tab

data.name: MusicBrowserNotSpecified
data.value: No music browser specified in app settings!
data.comment: Error thrown when there is no music browser

data.name: MusicDownloaderNotSpecified
data.value: No music downloader specified in app settings!
data.comment: Error thrown when there is no music downloader

data.name: MusicPlayerNotSpecified
data.value: No media player specified in app settings!
data.comment: Error thrown when there is no music player

data.name: MyAccount
data.comment: Displayed on the My Account tab

data.name: MyAccountHeading
data.comment: Heading shown on the My Account page

data.name: Password
data.comment: Displayed on the login and register forms

data.name: RatingsFailedVoteAgainst
data.value: You've already voted against this track!
data.comment: Message returned from a failed vote against a track due to the track already being voted against

data.name: RatingsSuccessVoteAgainst
data.value: You've successfully voted against this track!
data.comment: Message returned from a successful vote against a track

data.name: RatingsUnknownTracKVoteAgainst
data.value: Failed to vote against this track. Track unknown.
data.comment: Message returned from a failed vote against a track due to the track not being known

data.comment: Displayed on the login form

data.name: RememberMe
data.comment: Displayed on the login form

data.name: Search
data.comment: Search button

data.name: SearchResults
data.comment: Displayed at the tab when a search is done

data.comment: Displayed on the login and register forms
